column5: Police confirm a body has been found in the water off Centre Island's pier.  The body appears to have been in the water for several days.  There's no word on the name or gender of the person.  Police have been searching for a 35-year-old man who disappeared in the water off Cherry Beach on July 17.  The man was on a boat with friends when he fell into the water and didn't resurface.   CityNews
